FrontendFields.name: Device Register
FrontendFields.desc: These are all devices found in M365 to add to your CE Device Register.

FrontendFields.name: Temporary Access Pass Enabled
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the temporary access pass feature.

FrontendFields.name: Unused licenses
FrontendFields.desc: These are the licenses that are not assigned to an user, but have been purchased.

FrontendFields.name: Current Secure Score
FrontendFields.desc: The current Secure Score for this tenant. This is the sum of all the individual controls that have been implemented.

FrontendFields.name: Max Secure Score
FrontendFields.desc: The maximum Secure Score for this tenant. This is the sum of all the individual controls that can be implemented.

FrontendFields.name: Unused licenses
FrontendFields.desc: These are the licenses that are not assigned to an user, but have been purchased.
